commit_message: added install instructions
removed histone files
added NSC and RSC functions.
added QC metrics description
changed files from directory and started writing the vignette
added ggplot2 to import
made the PBC workhorse part with dplyr to pre-split by chr
updated DESCRIPTION
fixed errors from R CMD CHECK
added code to generate MAplot
Changed hexbin_plot function to hexbinPlot that uses ChIPdata object and modified the code accordingly
changed create_bins to createBins and modified the function accordingly to use Chipdata
changed the sizes from tsv files to a data list in package
removed Makefile
updated code for SCC
removed old constructor
changed the name of the file
removed reads methods and fixed constructor and PBC to be able to generate object for PE reads
changed reads class for Chipdata
fixed but on hexbin_plot that allows to use reads object with different chromosomes
fixed bug where the chr names weren't detected for prokaryote genomes
Added option to make a strand permutation when calculating local_strand_cross_corr.

Removed H3k4me1 example data to decrease the package's size.

Use dontrun in hexbin_plot and re-generated documentation
Changed the SCC method from method_reads.R to base_strand_cross_corr.R to have all SCC codes together.
Removed SSD function and fixed show method to start a new line after caption. Re-generated documentation.
fixed bug , where strand_cc weren't runnig when the reads file contained chrM
fixed error, where the strand_cc was incorrectly calculating the weights.
Corrected part where the wighted mean was being calculated but not save in a variable
Changes the calculatation of the sum of the chromosome sizes to avoid numeric overflow
Added as.numeric to weights calculation to avoid numeric overflow
Added parallel parameter to strand_cross_corr to allow to run the individual chromosome scc in parallel
Subset the reads in cover as the ones that overlap regions
added copies to create rF and rR
changed scales package version
Added option to hexbin_plot to be able to transform it into an MA plot
Fixed strand_cross_corr function for the case when there was only one chromosome
Added the option (and an example) to use log10 scale in both axis of the hexbin plot
Added SSD (standarized SD) method as a measure of uniformity in the sample
Changed syntax on examples, to write the whole reads_file in only one line
Added case to ignore frag_len when the reads are PET
Added example about how to calculate the PBC for PET fragment reads
Added code to load PET reads using readGAlignmentPairs and added example of loading PET fragments
Removed validity function due to the fact that are regions (in ChIP-exo specially) were there are fragments with one strand.

Fixed dependencies to be able to build and install the package.

In particualar, fixed the third example of hexbin_plot function
added default value for nr_bins parameter in hexbin_plot
Added hexbin_plot function. Right now only the viridis palette is available
moved files to correct folder
adding extra files for examples and vignette to inst/extdata
Added viridis to the package DESCRIPTION which is gonna be used as the palette in the hexbin_plot function that is being added to R/base_bins.R
Added code to calculate PCR bottleneck coefficient for Paired End data
Added isPET argument to function and to documentation. Also, added .Rhistory file to .gitignore
separated the case for PET when calculating PBC
Added isPET slot to reads class and added isPET method to determine if the reads are Paired End or not
Added method to generate bins
fixed bugs on local_cc function, where the region was empty and added documentation
made the function more robust
made the coverage to be a subset of bounds
fixed an issue in local strand cross corr
fixed documentation and example from strand_cross_corr
Added method to calculate strand cross correlation
Added method to calculate strand cross corr
Added a function that returns the available chrom sizes in the package
removed directory spec for R in Makefile
removed rbamtools from DESCRIPTION
added chromosome sizes for mm10
Fixed case when the reads don't overlap the region in local_strand_cross_corr
Changed the name of the local cross corr to local_strand_cross_corr
added code to calculate local_strand cross corr
Added function to get the summary of the reads files
fixed issue with stopifnot on reads set methods
Added utility function to convert from data.table to GRanges
Added function to calculate the PCR bottleneck coefficient
Added method to access the name of the reads file
Added the get and set methods for reads objects
fixed bugs on create_reads fun
fixed example
Added function to build a reads object
typo in documentation
added mm9 chrom sizes
removing .Rhistory also when cleaning
added function to convert from GRanges to data.table
added additional arguments to reads class
Added hexbin to description and size of hg19 chromosomes as baseline
adding dependency path for R to Makefile
reads class added
skeleton commit
first commit
